subTitle: Discover how Kasumi CRM can transform your customer communication strategy with our most frequently asked questions.

faqs.question: How does the unified broadcasting feature work?
faqs.answer: Our unified broadcasting feature allows you to compose a single message and send it simultaneously across multiple platforms including WhatsApp, Telegram, and Instagram. You can schedule broadcasts, segment your audience, and track engagement metrics across all platforms from one dashboard. The system automatically adapts your message format to each platform's requirements.

faqs.question: What message types are supported across platforms?
faqs.answer: Kasumi CRM supports text messages, images, videos, documents, voice notes, and location sharing across most platforms. The system automatically optimizes media for each platform's specifications. For platform-specific features (like WhatsApp catalogs or Instagram Stories), we provide specialized tools while maintaining the unified inbox experience.

faqs.question: Can I manage multiple business accounts from one dashboard?
faqs.answer: Yes! You can connect multiple business accounts from each platform (WhatsApp Business, Telegram, Instagram) to your Kasumi dashboard. Each team member can be assigned specific account access with customizable permission levels. Our Enterprise plan supports unlimited account connections with centralized analytics.

faqs.question: What are the automation capabilities?
faqs.answer: Our automation suite includes welcome messages, auto-replies, chatbots, and triggered responses based on keywords or customer actions. You can set up automated workflows for lead qualification, appointment scheduling, and follow-ups. All automations work across connected platforms while maintaining a personal touch in communications.

faqs.question: How does team collaboration work in Kasumi CRM?
faqs.answer: The team collaboration features include shared inboxes, message assignment, internal notes, and status tracking. Team members can tag colleagues, transfer conversations, and access a unified customer history. Supervisors can monitor response times and workload distribution through detailed analytics dashboards.

faqs.question: What kind of analytics and reporting are available?
faqs.answer: Our analytics suite provides real-time insights into message delivery rates, response times, customer engagement, and team performance. You can track conversation trends, peak messaging hours, and campaign effectiveness across all platforms. Custom reports can be scheduled and exported in various formats (PDF, CSV, Excel).
